data: Arrived at the site. Exploring with Zed.|1|5
Came across some scarabs. Zed doesn't like them. Gotta clear them out or we can't move on.|1|5

Cleared out the scarabs.

Investigating site further.|1|5
A number of boulders are in the way. Zed gave me some dynamite. Should be fun.|1|5
Droum received a set of cryptic directions from one of our sources. I'm carrying it with me.|1|5
Looks like someone left this chest behind in a hurry.|1|5
Found a Taiscrethean artifact, but we woke up a nest of scarabs! Gotta escape this place!|1|5
Valtiez's men tracked us down in the middle of nowhere. 3 against 2. We've faced worse odds.|1|5
This is quest info. Let's add some objectives!|1|3
This is more quest info. A second page of it even!|1|3
Check out the older journal entries with < or >!|1|0;1
